item.description:
TYKE / LITTLE FAMILY Itsy Bitsy Yoga (Sibling) Class (for kids age 2- almost 5; younger siblings welcome)

Description: Tykes Itsy Bitsy Yoga combines unique toddler-friendly yoga poses with songs, stories, and games to create an enriching parent/child activity. Tykes will learn yoga through social interaction, repetition, and play. Tykes also learn how to relieve frustration, improve motor skills, and increase attention span by actively following directions. Help your tyke build the foundation for a healthy and fit lifestyle while having fun! No yoga experience is required.
Thank you for arranging just 1 parent/caregiver per family.

Younger Siblings are welcome to join. Sibs over 12 months are $8 extra, under 12 months and they can come for FREE!

Next Weekend Tykes IBY Meetup Time: Saturday, June 27, 3:00-4:00pm
Cost: $15/class (pre-payment required w/ YES RSVP)

About Us: All Weekend IBY Meetup classes are taught by Alexandra De Collibus, Certified Itsy Bitsy Yoga Facilitator and Director of Absolute Yoga in Hopkinton, MA. Alexandra has offered IBY classes under the name Sweet Pea Yoga since 2003 and has taught hundreds of pint-sized yogis across MA and RI. Learn more at www.SweetPeaYoga.com

Itsy Bitsy Yoga was created by Helen Garabedian, an Infant Developmental Movement Educator, yoga teacher, and mother. Learn more at www.ItsyBitsyYoga.com
item.name: Weekend Tykes/Little Family (sibling) Meetup (June)
